14 #define KEEP_CAST_FRIENDLY \
15  template<typename T_C_Lhs, \
16  typename T_C_Rhs, \
17  typename T_C_Sbx, \
18  template<typename, typename> \
19  typename T_C_Wrap> \
20  friend inline tainted<T_C_Lhs, T_C_Sbx> sandbox_reinterpret_cast( \
21  const T_C_Wrap<T_C_Rhs, T_C_Sbx>& rhs) noexcept; \
22  \
23  template<typename T_C_Lhs, \
24  typename T_C_Rhs, \
25  typename T_C_Sbx, \
26  template<typename, typename> \
27  typename T_C_Wrap> \
28  friend inline tainted<T_C_Lhs, T_C_Sbx> sandbox_const_cast( \
29  const T_C_Wrap<T_C_Rhs, T_C_Sbx>& rhs) noexcept; \
30  \
31  template<typename T_C_Lhs, \
32  typename T_C_Rhs, \
33  typename T_C_Sbx, \
34  template<typename, typename> \
35  typename T_C_Wrap> \
36  friend inline tainted<T_C_Lhs, T_C_Sbx> sandbox_static_cast( \
37  const T_C_Wrap<T_C_Rhs, T_C_Sbx>& rhs) noexcept;

42 template<typename T_Lhs,
43  typename T_Rhs,
44  typename T_Sbx,
45  template<typename, typename>
46  typename T_Wrap>
47 inline tainted<T_Lhs, T_Sbx> sandbox_reinterpret_cast(
48  const T_Wrap<T_Rhs, T_Sbx>& rhs) noexcept
49 {
50  static_assert(detail::rlbox_is_wrapper_v<T_Wrap<T_Rhs, T_Sbx>> &&
51  std::is_pointer_v<T_Lhs> && std::is_pointer_v<T_Rhs>,
52  "sandbox_reinterpret_cast on incompatible types");
53 
54  tainted<T_Rhs, T_Sbx> taintedVal = rhs;
55  auto raw = reinterpret_cast<T_Lhs>(taintedVal.INTERNAL_unverified_safe());
56  auto ret = tainted<T_Lhs, T_Sbx>::internal_factory(raw);
57  return ret;
58 }

63 template<typename T_Lhs,
64  typename T_Rhs,
65  typename T_Sbx,
66  template<typename, typename>
67  typename T_Wrap>
68 inline tainted<T_Lhs, T_Sbx> sandbox_const_cast(
69  const T_Wrap<T_Rhs, T_Sbx>& rhs) noexcept
70 {
71  static_assert(detail::rlbox_is_wrapper_v<T_Wrap<T_Rhs, T_Sbx>>,
72  "sandbox_const_cast on incompatible types");
73 
74  tainted<T_Rhs, T_Sbx> taintedVal = rhs;
75  auto raw = const_cast<T_Lhs>(taintedVal.INTERNAL_unverified_safe());
76  auto ret = tainted<T_Lhs, T_Sbx>::internal_factory(raw);
77  return ret;
78 }

83 template<typename T_Lhs,
84  typename T_Rhs,
85  typename T_Sbx,
86  template<typename, typename>
87  typename T_Wrap>
88 inline tainted<T_Lhs, T_Sbx> sandbox_static_cast(
89  const T_Wrap<T_Rhs, T_Sbx>& rhs) noexcept
90 {
91  static_assert(detail::rlbox_is_wrapper_v<T_Wrap<T_Rhs, T_Sbx>>,
92  "sandbox_static_cast on incompatible types");
93 
94  tainted<T_Rhs, T_Sbx> taintedVal = rhs;
95  auto raw = static_cast<T_Lhs>(taintedVal.INTERNAL_unverified_safe());
96  auto ret = tainted<T_Lhs, T_Sbx>::internal_factory(raw);
97  return ret;
98 }

103 template<typename T_Sbx,
104  typename T_Rhs,
105  typename T_Val,
106  typename T_Num,
107  template<typename, typename>
108  typename T_Wrap>
109 inline T_Wrap<T_Rhs*, T_Sbx> memset(rlbox_sandbox<T_Sbx>& sandbox,
110  T_Wrap<T_Rhs*, T_Sbx> ptr,
111  T_Val value,
112  T_Num num)
113 {
114 
115  static_assert(detail::rlbox_is_tainted_or_vol_v<T_Wrap<T_Rhs, T_Sbx>>,
116  "memset called on non wrapped type");
117 
118  static_assert(!std::is_const_v<T_Rhs>, "Destination is const");
119 
120  auto num_val = detail::unwrap_value(num);
121  detail::dynamic_check(num_val <= sandbox.get_total_memory(),
122  "Called memset for memory larger than the sandbox");
123 
124  tainted<T_Rhs*, T_Sbx> ptr_tainted = ptr;
125  void* dest_start = ptr_tainted.INTERNAL_unverified_safe();
126  detail::check_range_doesnt_cross_app_sbx_boundary<T_Sbx>(dest_start, num_val);
127 
128  std::memset(dest_start, detail::unwrap_value(value), num_val);
129  return ptr;
130 }
131 
135 template<typename T_Sbx,
136  typename T_Rhs,
137  typename T_Lhs,
138  typename T_Num,
139  template<typename, typename>
140  typename T_Wrap>
141 inline T_Wrap<T_Rhs*, T_Sbx> memcpy(rlbox_sandbox<T_Sbx>& sandbox,
142  T_Wrap<T_Rhs*, T_Sbx> dest,
143  T_Lhs src,
144  T_Num num)
145 {
146 
147  static_assert(detail::rlbox_is_tainted_or_vol_v<T_Wrap<T_Rhs, T_Sbx>>,
148  "memcpy called on non wrapped type");
149 
150  static_assert(!std::is_const_v<T_Rhs>, "Destination is const");
151 
152  auto num_val = detail::unwrap_value(num);
153  detail::dynamic_check(num_val <= sandbox.get_total_memory(),
154  "Called memcpy for memory larger than the sandbox");
155 
156  tainted<T_Rhs*, T_Sbx> dest_tainted = dest;
157  void* dest_start = dest_tainted.INTERNAL_unverified_safe();
158  detail::check_range_doesnt_cross_app_sbx_boundary<T_Sbx>(dest_start, num_val);
159 
160  // src also needs to be checked, as we don't want to allow a src rand to start
161  // inside the sandbox and end outside, and vice versa
162  // src may or may not be a wrapper, so use unwrap_value
163  const void* src_start = detail::unwrap_value(src);
164  detail::check_range_doesnt_cross_app_sbx_boundary<T_Sbx>(src_start, num_val);
165 
166  std::memcpy(dest_start, src_start, num_val);
167 
168  return dest;
169 }
170 
174 template<typename T_Sbx, typename T_Rhs, typename T_Lhs, typename T_Num>
175 inline tainted_int_hint memcmp(rlbox_sandbox<T_Sbx>& sandbox,
176  T_Rhs&& dest,
177  T_Lhs&& src,
178  T_Num&& num)
179 {
180  static_assert(
181  detail::rlbox_is_tainted_or_vol_v<detail::remove_cv_ref_t<T_Rhs>> ||
182  detail::rlbox_is_tainted_or_vol_v<detail::remove_cv_ref_t<T_Lhs>>,
183  "memcmp called on non wrapped type");
184 
185  auto num_val = detail::unwrap_value(num);
186  detail::dynamic_check(num_val <= sandbox.get_total_memory(),
187  "Called memcmp for memory larger than the sandbox");
188 
189  void* dest_start = dest.INTERNAL_unverified_safe();
190  detail::check_range_doesnt_cross_app_sbx_boundary<T_Sbx>(dest_start, num_val);
191 
192  // src also needs to be checked, as we don't want to allow a src rand to start
193  // inside the sandbox and end outside, and vice versa
194  // src may or may not be a wrapper, so use unwrap_value
195  const void* src_start = detail::unwrap_value(src);
196  detail::check_range_doesnt_cross_app_sbx_boundary<T_Sbx>(src_start, num_val);
197 
198  int ret = std::memcmp(dest_start, src_start, num_val);
199  tainted_int_hint converted_ret(ret);
200  return converted_ret;
201 }

216 template<typename T_Sbx, typename T>
217 tainted<T*, T_Sbx> copy_memory_or_grant_access(rlbox_sandbox<T_Sbx>& sandbox,
218  T* src,
219  size_t num,
220  bool free_source_on_copy,
221  bool& copied)
222 {
223  // sandbox can grant access if it includes the following line
224  // using can_grant_deny_access = void;
225  if constexpr (detail::has_member_using_can_grant_deny_access_v<T_Sbx>) {
226  detail::check_range_doesnt_cross_app_sbx_boundary<T_Sbx>(src, num);
227 
228  bool success;
229  auto ret = sandbox.INTERNAL_grant_access(src, num, success);
230  if (success) {
231  copied = false;
232  return ret;
233  }
234  }
235 
236  using T_nocv = std::remove_cv_t<T>;
237  tainted<T_nocv*, T_Sbx> copy =
238  sandbox.template malloc_in_sandbox<T_nocv>(num);
239  rlbox::memcpy(sandbox, copy, src, num);
240  if (free_source_on_copy) {
241  free(const_cast<void*>(reinterpret_cast<const void*>(src)));
242  }
243 
244  copied = true;
245  return sandbox_const_cast<T*>(copy);
246 }
247 
262 template<typename T_Sbx,
263  typename T,
264  template<typename, typename>
265  typename T_Wrap>
266 T* copy_memory_or_deny_access(rlbox_sandbox<T_Sbx>& sandbox,
267  T_Wrap<T*, T_Sbx> src,
268  size_t num,
269  bool free_source_on_copy,
270  bool& copied)
271 {
272  // sandbox can grant access if it includes the following line
273  // using can_grant_deny_access = void;
274  if constexpr (detail::has_member_using_can_grant_deny_access_v<T_Sbx>) {
275  detail::check_range_doesnt_cross_app_sbx_boundary<T_Sbx>(
276  src.INTERNAL_unverified_safe(), num);
277 
278  bool success;
279  auto ret = sandbox.INTERNAL_deny_access(src, num, success);
280  if (success) {
281  copied = false;
282  return ret;
283  }
284  }
285 
286  auto copy = static_cast<T*>(malloc(num));
287 
288  tainted<T*, T_Sbx> src_tainted = src;
289  char* src_raw = src_tainted.copy_and_verify_buffer_address(
290  [](uintptr_t val) { return reinterpret_cast<char*>(val); }, num);
291  std::memcpy(copy, src_raw, num);
292  if (free_source_on_copy) {
293  sandbox.free_in_sandbox(src);
294  }
295 
296  copied = true;
297  return copy;
298 }
